text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 81.1. Jab sooraj lappet liya jaey ga 81.2. Aur jab sitary by noor hojaein gay 81.3. Aur jab pahar chalaye jaein gya 81.4. Aur jab das mah ki hamla oontniyan chor di jaein gi
